K10bsu008_u:2: ekasmin samaye bhagavān mahānadīnairañjanātīre sanniṣaṇṇaḥ sārdhamāryāvalokiteśvara
K10bsu008_u:6: bhagavān bhaktakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā maṇḍalamālāyāṃ sanniṣaṇṇo dharmapratisaṃyuktayā kathayā etān santoṣayati sañcodayati samuttejayati saṃharṣayati
K10bsu008_u:7: maṇḍalamālāyāstathāgato maharddhinagarīṃ vārāṇasīṃ gatvā tasyāmāmrapālīvane niṣīdati sma /
K10bsu008_u:8: atha tasmin samaye mahāpṛthivī saṅkampitā sampravedhitā /
K10bsu008_u:9: sthitaṃ tatra mahāsiṃhāsanamekaṃ nānāratnamayaṃ saptakarmakṛtaṃ yojanamātramuccamardhayojanamātravistṛtaṃ
K10bsu008_u:13: atha bhagavān siṃhāsanasthito buddhāvataṃsakanāma samādhiṃ pratileme /
K10bsu008_u:15: avalokiteśvara tvaṃ mahālokadhātuṃ gatvā ca daśasu dikṣu lokadhātau vineyasattvānāṃ
K10bsu008_u:16: kaṣāyayuktānām aśrāddhānāṃ pāpacaritānāṃ kleśāvṛtānām amātṛjñānāmapitṛjñānām aśrāmaṇyānām
K10bsu008_u:17: abrāhmaṇyānāṃ triratnānabhiśrāddhānāṃ teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ tvaṃ ca vajrapāṇiśca dvau maharddhiṃ
K10bsu008_u:18: samādhibalaṃ pratipadya asyāṃ maṇḍalamālāyāmabhisaṅkṣipya saṅgrahaṃ kurutam /
K10bsu008_u:19: athāryāvalokiteśvaro vajrapāṇiśca tathāgatasya vacanaṃ śrutvā sarvasattvānavalokya samuttejanaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede /
K10bsu008_u:20: tena samādhibalena mahāpṛthivī ṣaḍvikāraṃ kampitā prakampitā samprakampitā /
K10bsu008_u:21: trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau brahmalokadhātau yāvad rūpalokadhātau tayoḥ kāyāvabhāsaprādurbhāvo 'bhūt /
K10bsu008_u:22: atha tadavabhāsata imāḥ sañcodanā gāthā niścaranti sma /
K10bsu008_u:23: atha tadā kāyāvabhāsaniścaritagāthāvasāne ekaikaṃ pāramparyeṇa trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarve sattvā vijñāpitāḥ samuttejivāḥ /
K10bsu008_u:24: te sarve sattvā mithyādṛṣṭiṃ parityajya samyagadṛṣṭiyuktā abhūvan /
K10bsu008_u:26: ye kāmarāgānucaritāḥ pramattāste prāṇātipātādattādānakāmeṣu mithyācārādyaṣṭākuśaladharmebhyo nivṛttāḥ āryāṣṭāṅgikamārge sthāpitāḥ /
K10bsu008_u:29: atha sarve te yena mahānagaryayāṃ vārāṇasyām āmrapālīvanaṃ tenopasaṅkramya tathāgatānāmavaropitakuśalamūlapuṇyatejasā tathāgatasyopari puṣpavargamabhiprāvarṣan
K10bsu008_u:30: atha tadā bhagavān jambudvīpe āmrapālīvanaṃ samantataḥ niyutaśatasahasrayojanavistīrṇamadhyatiṣṭhat (BuBal 177.18)
K10bsu008_u:31: samaṃ pāṇitalamiva ca divyaṃ manoramaṃ varṇopetam /
K10bsu008_u:37: athāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo vajrapāṇiśca samādhervyutthāya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
K10bsu008_u:43: evameva bahavo bho jinaputrāstathāgatānāmupāyakauśalyaṃ sattvaparipākāya yathāśayānāṃ yathā vainayikakuśalamūlādhigatānāṃ nānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ cariṃ jñātvā dharmaṃ deśayanti /
K10bsu008_u:44: kecit sattvā bodhisattvavaineyāḥ kecicchrāvakavaineyāḥ kecit pratyekabuddhavaineyāḥ
K10bsu008_u:45: kecid devavaineyāḥ kecit śakravaineyāḥ kecid brahmavaineyāḥ kecinnāgavaineyāḥ kecinmahardhikavaineyāḥ
K10bsu008_u:46: kecidrājavaineyāḥ kecit samādhivaineyāḥ kecid dharmaśravaṇavaineyāḥ kecit prātihāryavaineyāḥ
K10bsu008_u:52: dharmāṇāmapi ca bho jinaputrā nāsti tathāgatānāṃ kiñcidajñātaṃ vā adṛṣṭaṃ vā aśrutaṃ vā aviditaṃ vā /
K10bsu008_u:64: tadyathā bho jinaputrā vaidyaḥ suśikṣitaḥ sarvāṣṭāṅgāyurvedamupagataḥ sarvadhātukauśalyasarvadravyopakaraṇaprayogābhiyuktaḥ sattvānāṃ nānāvyādhiśarīraparipīḍitānāṃ dhātuṃ jānāti /
K10bsu008_u:69: rudhiram āmajaṃ gulmikaṃ jalodaraṃ hṛdarogaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ kaṇḍūṃ dadruṃ piṭakādīn viṣavaisarpādīn jānāti /
K10bsu008_u:70: sa sarvaṃ jñātvā nānāvidhāni dravyauṣadhāni prayojya vamanavirecanacūrṇayoganastukarmasīrābandhanadhṛtatailabālacūrṇayogena
K10bsu008_u:80: tadyathāpi kulaputrāḥ candramaṇḍalamupāyākauśalya samanvāgataṃ yathādhātukuśalamūlavaineyān sattvānāmarthāya ātmānamantarhitaṃ darśayati /
K10bsu008_u:86: evameva bho jinaputrāḥ tathāgatānāṃ nānāduḥkhāvṛtānāṃ sattvānāṃ nānādhātuvaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ mārgacaryākauśalyaṃ parinirvāṇaṃ darśayati /
K10bsu008_u:97: atha tasmin samaye keṣāñcidalpabuddhīnāṃ devaputrāṇām etadabhavat /
K10bsu008_u:98: kimayaṃ tathāgataḥ kṣiprameva parinirvāṇadhātau praveṣṭumicchatīti te cintayitvā durmanasaḥ abhūvan /
K10bsu008_u:104: tathāyamanena tathāgatena sarve tathāgatakṛtyaṃ nādyāpi kṛtam /
K10bsu008_u:105: tasmāt śokavyatikramaṇaṃ saṃvarṇayatīti cintayitvā te tūṣṇīmabhūvan /
K10bsu008_u:106: atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtasteṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cittamājñāya tān devaputrānetadavocat /
K10bsu008_u:107: devaputrā mā evaṃ cintayata mā pravyāharata /
K10bsu008_u:110: yathā mayā devaputrāḥ tathāgatānāṃ pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgatopāyakauśalyam ṛddhivikurvāṇaprātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tathāhaṃ jānāmi /
K10bsu008_u:111: mā hi eva tathāgato buddhabalādhānaprātihāryaṃ nāma mahāsūtrarājaṃ prakāśayitukāmo 'tireka kartukāmaḥ /
K10bsu008_u:112: api ca devaputrā na tathāgatāḥ parinirvānti /
K10bsu008_u:116: api ca upāyakauśalyena sattvānāṃ parinirvāṇaṃ darśayanti /
K10bsu008_u:119: yathā yathā sattvān paśyati parinirvāṇavaineyaḥ dhātuvaineyaḥ kaṣāyikajātīyaḥ tathāgate
K10bsu008_u:120: aśraddadhānatām aguruśuśrūṣitāṃ gacchati tathā tathāgataḥ parinirvāṇaṃ darśayati
K10bsu008_u:124: candramaṇḍalaṃ yathā rocate tathā tadā tathāgatā loka utpadyante bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya /
K10bsu008_u:125: yāvaddevānāṃ ca munuṣyāṇāṃ ca triratnoddayotanāya sphuṭanāya na ca tathāgatānāṃ jātiḥ saṃvidyate /
K10bsu008_u:126: tad yathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ ādarśamaṇḍale sumṛṣṭe nānā rūpāṇi dṛśyante dṛśyaṃ na
K10bsu008_u:127: saṃvidyate na tatrāgamo dṛśyate na nirgamaḥ pratibimbasya evameva devaputrāḥ tathāgatakāyo draṣṭavyaḥ /
K10bsu008_u:128: tad yathāpi nāma kulaputrā māyakāraḥsuśikṣitaḥ nānānagaratoraṇodyānāṃ nānārathāṃ
K10bsu008_u:129: cakravartirūpāṃ nānāratikrīḍāṃ darśayitvā antardhāpayati na ca tasyāḥ krāntirdṛśyate
K10bsu008_u:130: na āgamo na nirgamaḥ evameva tathāgatānāmutapādaparinirvāṇaṃ draṣṭavyam /
K10bsu008_u:131: api ca devaputrāḥ pūrvapraṇidhānena tathāgatāḥ parinirvṛtā api kalpaparinirvṛtā api
K10bsu008_u:133: nānālokadhātuvyavasthitā api mokṣayanti sarvanarakatiryagyoniyamalokākṣaṇadurgativinipātebhyaḥ sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ yāvadanupūrveṇa anuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimabhisambudhyate
K10bsu008_u:134: kaḥ punarvādo ye tathāgatān pratyakṣapūjayā pūjayiṣyanti gandhapuṣpamālyavilepanavastrābharaṇaiḥ /
K10bsu008_u:135: ye ca devaputrāḥ kecit sattvā varṣaśatasahasrakalpakoṭīparinirvṛtān prāñjalibhūtān
K10bsu008_u:136: ekavārān nāmadheyaṃ grahīṣyanti 'namo buddhāyeti ' kṛtvā puṣpamākāśe kṣepasyanti
K10bsu008_u:138: tiṣṭhatvākāśe puṣpaṃ ye kecit sattvāḥ anuśikṣamāṇāstathāgatapūjārthāya ekatathāgataśikṣāmapi
K10bsu008_u:141: ye ca tathāgatapūjāyāṃ diśyasikanāma....vāpi hāsyalāsyabālaratikrīḍanakameva kārayiṣyanti
K10bsu008_u:142: sarve te duḥkhasyāntaṃ kṛtvānuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimabhisambodhiṣyanti kaḥ punarvādo
K10bsu008_u:143: ye dhātustūpaṃ dhātupratimāṃ vā kṛtvā sarvasattvadayāparajñāḥ 'sarvasattvān duḥkhebhyaḥ
